leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 工程仿真-FEA/多物理场求解生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→求解→后处理→反问题→验证

tools.name: Dual_error_DG
tools.one_line_profile: DG solver for compressible Euler equations with adjoint error estimation
tools.detailed_description: A Discontinuous Galerkin (DG) solver that implements adjoint error estimation and adaptive refinement for solving compressible 2D Euler equations.

tools.name: AMICI
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance sensitivity analysis for ODE models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for high-performance sensitivity analysis of large ordinary differential equation (ODE) models, providing interfaces for C++, Python, and MATLAB.

tools.name: GCMAES.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-based CMA-ES optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation of the Gradient-based Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolutionary Strategy (GCMA-ES) for real blackbox optimization.

tools.name: TetWeave
tools.one_line_profile: Isosurface extraction with gradient-based mesh optimization
tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for isosurface extraction using on-the-fly Delaunay tetrahedral grids, featuring gradient-based mesh optimization.

tools.name: ttopt
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-free optimization using Tensor Train format
tools.detailed_description: A library for gradient-free optimization of multivariable functions based on the low rank tensor train (TT) format and maximal-volume principle.

tools.name: GlobalBioIm
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab framework for inverse problems in computational imaging
tools.detailed_description: A unifying Matlab framework for the development of reconstruction algorithms and solving inverse problems in computational imaging.

tools.name: BlindDPS
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Diffusion Model for Blind Inverse Problems
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Parallel Diffusion Model of Operator and Image for Blind Inverse Problems', solving inverse problems where the forward operator is unknown or uncertain.

tools.name: FATODE
tools.one_line_profile: Fortran library for ODE integration with adjoint sensitivity
tools.detailed_description: A FORTRAN library for the integration of ordinary differential equations with direct and adjoint sensitivity analysis capabilities, developed by Computational Science Laboratory.

tools.name: PINNs_wave_equation
tools.one_line_profile: PINNs for forward and inverse wave equation problems
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) to solve various forward and inverse problems for the 1-dimensional wave equation.

tools.name: Diffusion Posterior Sampling
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for general noisy inverse problems using diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Diffusion Posterior Sampling for General Noisy Inverse Problems', providing a method to solve inverse problems using pre-trained diffusion models.

tools.name: pde-dataset-generator
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for PDE ground truth datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating Partial Differential Equations (PDE) ground truth datasets from solvers like ARCSim, FEniCS, and SU2, useful for training AI4S models.

tools.name: FlowDPS
tools.one_line_profile: Flow-Driven Posterior Sampling for Inverse Problems
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of FlowDPS, a method using flow-based models for posterior sampling in inverse problems.

tools.name: Concurrent-topology-optimization-in-Matlab
tools.one_line_profile: Concurrent topology optimization of multiscale composite structures
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab implementation for concurrent topology optimization of multiscale composite structures.

tools.name: DiffTactile
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-based differentiable tactile simulator
tools.detailed_description: A physics-based differentiable tactile simulator for contact-rich robotic manipulation, enabling gradient-based optimization for physical interactions.

tools.name: ThinShellLab
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics simulation for thin-shell objects
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics simulation framework for manipulating thin-shell objects, supporting gradient-based optimization.

tools.name: HiQGA.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Geophysical inversion framework
tools.detailed_description: High Quality Geophysical Analysis (HiQGA) provides a general purpose Bayesian and deterministic inversion framework for various geophysical methods.

tools.name: Topology-Optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Moving Node Approach for Topology Optimization
tools.detailed_description: Topology optimization implementation based on the Moving Node Approach using Element-Free Galerkin (EFG) or Finite Element Methods (FEM).

tools.name: TOP-OPT-Plates
tools.one_line_profile: Topology Optimization of Plates
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB code for topology optimization of plate structures.

tools.name: SSD
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated Diffusion Models for Inverse Problems
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SSD (Shortcut Sampling for Diffusion), accelerating diffusion models for solving inverse problems.

tools.name: TopoTraj
tools.one_line_profile: Robust UAV local planner with topological paths
tools.detailed_description: A robust UAV local planner using guided gradient-based optimization and topological paths for trajectory generation.

tools.name: grad_traj_optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-Based Online Safe Trajectory Generator
tools.detailed_description: A gradient-based online safe trajectory generator for quadrotors, enabling real-time optimization of trajectories.

tools.name: Optiland
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive optical design and optimization library with differentiable ray tracing
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for optical design, optimization, and analysis, featuring GPU-accelerated and differentiable ray tracing capabilities via PyTorch, suitable for complex optical system engineering.

tools.name: TopOpt Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset specifically designed for topology optimization research
tools.detailed_description: A curated dataset aimed at training and benchmarking machine learning models for topology optimization tasks.

tools.name: jax-fenics-adjoint
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable interface connecting FEniCS/Firedrake with JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a differentiable bridge between FEniCS/Firedrake finite element solvers and JAX, enabling gradient-based optimization and inverse problem solving using automatic differentiation.

tools.name: graphGalerkin
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed graph neural Galerkin networks framework
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework utilizing physics-informed graph neural Galerkin networks for solving PDE-governed forward and inverse problems.

tools.name: jInv.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for parallel PDE parameter estimation
tools.detailed_description: A flexible Julia framework designed for solving parameter estimation problems in partial differential equations, supporting parallel computing.

tools.name: Nonconvex.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for non-convex constrained optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Julia toolbox providing gradient-based and derivative-free algorithms for non-convex constrained optimization problems, supporting both continuous and discrete variables.

tools.name: PDENLPModels.jl
tools.one_line_profile: API for PDE-constrained optimization problems
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing an NLPModel API specifically for defining and solving optimization problems constrained by partial differential equations.

tools.name: TopOpt.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization package for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive package for 2D and 3D topology optimization on unstructured meshes, supporting various material models and using automatic differentiation.

tools.name: MultiscaleTopOpt
tools.one_line_profile: 3D multiscale topology optimization software
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based code for 3D multiscale topology optimization utilizing surrogate models for lattice microscale responses, developed by LLNL.

tools.name: DynaShape
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamo plugin for form finding and physics simulation
tools.detailed_description: An open-source plugin for Dynamo enabling constraint-based form finding, optimization, and physics simulation for architectural and engineering design.

tools.name: OpenLSTO-lite
tools.one_line_profile: Level set topology optimization software
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software implementation for level set-based topology optimization.

tools.name: MTO
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel solver for multiphysics topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: A parallel solver designed for thermal-fluid-structural topology optimization on unstructured grids.

tools.name: torchoptics
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable wave optics simulation library
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for differentiable wave optics simulation, enabling gradient-based optimization of optical systems.

tools.name: AutoStitching
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic topology constructing and global stitching optimization for UAV images
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic topology construction and global stitching optimization designed for large-scale unordered UAV aerial images, implementing pattern recognition techniques for photogrammetry.

tools.name: wuFoil
tools.one_line_profile: Airfoil modelling, meshing, analysis, and optimization tool
tools.detailed_description: An all-in-one airfoil modelling, meshing, analysis, and optimization tool that integrates with Gmsh, SU2, and XFoil to streamline aerodynamic design workflows.

tools.name: geoapps
tools.one_line_profile: Geoscience applications for inversion and modeling
tools.detailed_description: A collection of open-source applications for geoscience inversion and modeling, designed to work with Mira Geoscience's solutions, facilitating geophysical data analysis and interpretation.

tools.name: Meep
tools.one_line_profile: Finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) software for electromagnetic simulations
tools.detailed_description: A free and open-source software package for electromagnetic simulations using the finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) method, widely used for modeling optical and photonic devices.

tools.name: One-2-3-45
tools.one_line_profile: Single image to 3D mesh generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapidly generating 3D meshes from a single image without per-shape optimization, leveraging diffusion models and reconstruction techniques.

tools.name: Aviary
tools.one_line_profile: Aircraft analysis, design, and optimization tool
tools.detailed_description: NASA's tool for aircraft analysis, design, and optimization, built on top of OpenMDAO to model complex aerospace systems and perform multidisciplinary optimization.

tools.name: OpenMDAO
tools.one_line_profile: Multidisciplinary Design Analysis and Optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: An open-source high-performance computing platform for systems analysis and optimization, enabling the decomposition of models for efficient parallel numerical solution and optimization.

tools.name: Dymos
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization of Dynamic Multidisciplinary Systems
tools.detailed_description: A library for the simulation and optimization of dynamic systems within the OpenMDAO framework, specializing in trajectory optimization and optimal control problems.

tools.name: MPhys
tools.one_line_profile: Multiphysics interface standard for OpenMDAO
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides a standard interface for coupling multiphysics simulations within OpenMDAO, facilitating the connection of various high-fidelity solvers for optimization.

tools.name: pyCycle
tools.one_line_profile: Thermodynamic cycle modeling library
tools.detailed_description: A thermodynamic cycle modeling library built on top of OpenMDAO, used for analyzing and optimizing propulsion systems and engine cycles.

tools.name: PaddleCFD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for fluid mechanics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning toolkit based on PaddlePaddle for surrogate modeling, equation discovery, shape optimization, and flow-control strategy discovery in fluid mechanics.

tools.name: WasteOptimiser
tools.one_line_profile: Irregular shape nesting software for waste material optimisation
tools.detailed_description: Software for optimizing the nesting of irregular shapes in 2D machining to minimize waste material, applicable in manufacturing engineering.

tools.name: Puma-Robot-Simulation
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of a Puma 762 manipulator
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool for the Puma 762 robotic manipulator, capable of solving forward and inverse kinematics problems, useful for robotics research and education.

tools.name: NeuralSolvers
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network based solvers for PDEs and inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) and other neural solvers for partial differential equations and inverse problems.

tools.name: torch-diffsim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics simulator in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A minimal, parallelizable physics simulator that supports differentiation entirely within PyTorch, enabling gradient-based optimization of physical systems.

tools.name: NCG-Optimizer
tools.one_line_profile: Nonlinear Conjugate Gradient optimizer for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the nonlinear conjugate gradient method, a numerical optimization algorithm useful for scientific machine learning and large-scale optimization.

tools.name: Point-line-LIVO
tools.one_line_profile: Lidar-Inertial-Visual Odometry using patch-based gradient optimization
tools.detailed_description: A SLAM system implementing Point-line LIVO using patch-based gradient optimization, designed for robust state estimation in degenerate scenes.

tools.name: SAFE-python
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity Analysis library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing Global Sensitivity Analysis (GSA), providing tools to assess the influence of model inputs on outputs.

tools.name: SALib
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity Analysis Library in Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for Sensitivity Analysis, containing implementations of Sobol, Morris, FAST, and other methods for model analysis.

tools.name: GlobalSensitivity.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Global Sensitivity Analysis (GSA) in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for robust, fast, and parallel Global Sensitivity Analysis, part of the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: Optimization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Mathematical Optimization in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A unified interface for mathematical optimization in Julia, supporting local, global, gradient-based, and derivative-free methods for various optimization classes.

tools.name: SciMLSensitivity.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity analysis for scientific machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A component of the SciML ecosystem enabling sensitivity analysis and automatic differentiation for differential equation solvers (ODEs, SDEs, etc.), supporting adjoint methods.

tools.name: Gradient-Free-Optimizers
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization library with local, global, and population-based techniques
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a collection of gradient-free optimization algorithms (Hill Climbing, Simulated Annealing, Particle Swarm, etc.) for numerical discrete search spaces.

tools.name: fastNLfea
tools.one_line_profile: Fast nonlinear Finite Element Analysis for topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based fast nonlinear Finite Element Analysis (FEA) solver specifically tailored for topology optimization tasks.

tools.name: simdec-python
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity analysis using simulation decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Simulation Decomposition (SimDec) method for sensitivity analysis, allowing for the visualization and quantification of input variable effects on simulation outputs.

tools.name: Swan
tools.one_line_profile: Topology Optimization Laboratory toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for topology optimization, providing a collection of methods and structures for structural design optimization.

tools.name: swolfpy
tools.one_line_profile: Solid Waste Management LCA optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) optimization framework for Solid Waste Management (SWM) systems, featuring parametric and Monte Carlo sensitivity and uncertainty analysis.

tools.name: TFPnP
tools.one_line_profile: Tuning-free Plug-and-Play Proximal Algorithm for Inverse Imaging
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a tuning-free Plug-and-Play proximal algorithm for solving inverse imaging problems, supporting tasks like denoising and reconstruction.

tools.name: Global-Sensitivity-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Code to compute Sobol' indices for sensitivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python and Matlab codes for performing global sensitivity analysis by computing Sobol' indices.

tools.name: TopologyOptimizationToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Structural Topology Optimization in Matlab
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab toolbox for 3D structural topology optimization using unstructured meshes.

tools.name: Multiscale-KMC
tools.one_line_profile: Kinetic Monte Carlo with multiple time scales and sensitivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of Kinetic Monte Carlo (KMC) simulation supporting multiple time scales and sensitivity analysis for chemical kinetics.

tools.name: CoFiI2P
tools.one_line_profile: Coarse-to-Fine Correspondences-Based Image-to-Point Cloud Registration
tools.detailed_description: A tool for registering images to point clouds using a coarse-to-fine correspondence approach, solving the spatial alignment optimization problem.

tools.name: WISDEM
tools.one_line_profile: Wind Plant Integrated System Design and Engineering Model
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based framework for the integrated design and engineering modeling of wind plants, supporting system-level optimization.

tools.name: DiffSkill
tools.one_line_profile: Skill Abstraction from Differentiable Physics
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging differentiable physics for learning deformable object manipulations, enabling gradient-based optimization for control tasks.

tools.name: diffsim
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Differentiable Physics for Learning and Control
tools.detailed_description: A scalable differentiable physics engine designed for learning and control tasks, supporting gradient-based optimization of physical systems.

tools.name: AspenPlus-Python-Interface
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Aspen Plus automation and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface acting as an API to automate design synthesis and optimization in Aspen Plus, including implementations of optimization libraries.

tools.name: SDFDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Rendering of Signed Distance Fields for 3D Shape Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for differentiable rendering of Signed Distance Fields (SDF), enabling 3D shape optimization through gradient-based methods.

tools.name: Implicit-SDF-Planner
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous Implicit SDF Based Any-shape Robot Trajectory Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A trajectory optimization planner for robots using continuous implicit Signed Distance Fields (SDF) to handle collision avoidance and path planning.

tools.name: FPS-SMC
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Posterior Sampling for Linear Inverse Problem Solving
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Filtering Posterior Sampling (FPS) and FPS-SMC for solving linear inverse problems using diffusion models.

tools.name: pyMOTO
tools.one_line_profile: Modular Python framework for topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: A modular Python framework designed for topology optimization, facilitating the development and testing of optimization algorithms.

tools.name: learned_gradient_tomography
tools.one_line_profile: Solving ill-posed inverse problems using iterative deep neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework for solving ill-posed inverse problems, specifically tomography, using iterative deep neural networks (learned gradients).

tools.name: matadi
tools.one_line_profile: Material Definition with Automatic Differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for defining material models with support for automatic differentiation, facilitating gradient-based optimization and analysis in mechanics.

tools.name: LakeEnsemblR
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-model ensembles for lake thermodynamics
tools.detailed_description: An R package facilitating multi-model ensembles for lake thermodynamics, including tools for calibration, sensitivity analysis, and data visualization.

tools.name: SmartGlass
tools.one_line_profile: Diffractive optical neural network implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of a diffractive optical neural network (SmartGlass) that supports training optical classifiers and designing optics using gradient-free optimization.

tools.name: JAXsim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics engine and multibody dynamics library
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine and multibody dynamics library designed for control and robot learning, enabling gradient-based optimization of physical systems.

tools.name: PROTES
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-free optimization method for multidimensional arrays
tools.detailed_description: A gradient-free optimization method for multidimensional arrays and discretized multivariate functions based on the tensor train (TT) format, suitable for black-box optimization.

tools.name: scipydirect
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the DIRECT global optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper to the DIRECT (DIviding RECTangles) global optimization algorithm, providing a scipy.optimize compatible interface for solving difficult global optimization problems.

tools.name: eispy2d
tools.one_line_profile: Library for 2D Electromagnetic Inverse Scattering Problems
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library for developing and testing algorithms for 2D Electromagnetic Inverse Scattering Problems (ISP), facilitating research in inverse modeling.

tools.name: emopt
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for optimizing electromagnetic structures
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for optimizing the shape and topology of electromagnetic structures, utilizing adjoint methods for efficient gradient calculation.

tools.name: TopOpt-Abaqus
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization scripts for Abaqus CAE
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python scripts to perform topology optimization within the Abaqus CAE environment, automating the FEA and optimization loop.

tools.name: Stanton (Greenbox)
tools.one_line_profile: Excel-based Monte Carlo sensitivity analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: An Excel-based tool for performing Monte Carlo three-point sensitivity analysis, enabling uncertainty quantification in spreadsheet models.

tools.name: pinnfactory
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for building Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight framework for building Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) with symbolic PDE definitions using SymPy and automatic differentiation in PyTorch.

tools.name: FBPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Finite Basis Physics-Informed Neural Networks solver
tools.detailed_description: A library to solve forward and inverse problems related to partial differential equations using finite basis physics-informed neural networks (FBPINNs), offering improved scalability.

tools.name: Phaenotyp
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic mutation tool for architectural structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows performing genetic mutation of architectural structures and analyzing moving shapes, useful for kinematic architectural design optimization.

tools.name: SciBmad.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable accelerator physics code in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A modular, polymorphic, and differentiable accelerator physics library in Julia, serving as an interface or extension to the Bmad ecosystem for beam dynamics simulation and optimization.

tools.name: libpgo
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Physics, Geometry, and Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for Physically based Simulation, Geometric Shape Modeling, and Optimization, providing core components for computer graphics and engineering simulation.

tools.name: KotlinGrad
tools.one_line_profile: Shape-safe symbolic differentiation library
tools.detailed_description: A library for shape-safe symbolic differentiation with algebraic data types in Kotlin, useful for implementing mathematically rigorous optimization and physics models.

tools.name: ImplicitAD.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Adjoint differentiation for implicit functions
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library that automates steady and unsteady adjoints for implicit functions, enabling gradient-based optimization around solvers without propagating AD through the solver internals.

tools.name: OpenMDAO.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for OpenMDAO
tools.detailed_description: A Julia wrapper for the OpenMDAO multidisciplinary design analysis and optimization framework, allowing Julia codes to interact with OpenMDAO workflows.

tools.name: SNOW.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Nonlinear Optimization Wrapper
tools.detailed_description: An optimization framework for nonlinear, gradient-based constrained, sparse optimization problems, designed to facilitate complex engineering design optimization.

tools.name: JAX-ReaxFF
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-based optimization for Reactive Force Fields
tools.detailed_description: A framework using JAX for the extremely fast optimization of Reactive Force Fields (ReaxFF), enabling differentiable molecular dynamics parameter fitting.

tools.name: BESO
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization using CalculiX
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Bi-directional Evolutionary Structural Optimization (BESO) method using the CalculiX FEM solver for structural topology optimization.

tools.name: dml.sensemakr
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity analysis tools for causal ML
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing sensitivity analysis tools for causal machine learning models, extending the sensemakr framework to Double Machine Learning (DML) contexts.

tools.name: sensemakr
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity analysis tools for OLS
tools.detailed_description: A suite of sensitivity analysis tools for Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) regression, helping researchers understand the robustness of their causal inferences to unobserved confounding.

tools.name: Rodin
tools.one_line_profile: C++20 finite element and shape optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: A modern C++20 framework for finite element method (FEM) analysis and shape optimization, emphasizing high performance and modern language features.

tools.name: CEASIOMpy
tools.one_line_profile: Conceptual aircraft design environment
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based environment for conceptual aircraft design, integrating various tools for geometry, aerodynamics, and stability analysis into a unified workflow.

tools.name: GMSH-Airfoil-2D
tools.one_line_profile: 2D airfoil mesh generator using Gmsh
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to automatically generate 2D meshes around airfoils using the Gmsh mesh generator, useful for CFD simulations and shape optimization workflows.

tools.name: lumopt
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous adjoint optimization wrapper for Lumerical FDTD/MODE
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based wrapper for Lumerical's photonics simulation software that enables continuous adjoint optimization for inverse design of photonic components.

tools.name: BISIP
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian inversion tool for spectral induced polarization data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the Bayesian inversion of spectral induced polarization (SIP) laboratory data, utilizing Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods for parameter estimation.

tools.name: euler2d
tools.one_line_profile: 2D unstructured grid Euler solver with adjoint capability
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based solver for 2D inviscid flow (Euler equations) on unstructured grids, featuring an adjoint solver for aerodynamic shape optimization.

tools.name: sensitivity
tools.one_line_profile: Global sensitivity analysis of model outputs
tools.detailed_description: An R package for global sensitivity analysis of model outputs, providing functions for screening, importance measures, and reliability sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: mdmm-jax
tools.one_line_profile: Modified Differential Multiplier Method for JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing the Modified Differential Multiplier Method (MDMM) for gradient-based constrained optimization within the JAX framework.

tools.name: ODIL
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for solving inverse problems and data assimilation for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: ODIL (Optimizing a Discrete Loss) is a Python framework designed to solve inverse and data assimilation problems involving partial differential equations by optimizing a discrete loss function.

tools.name: FusionForce
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics engine for robot-terrain interaction
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine designed to predict robot-terrain interactions by fusing RGB and LiDAR data, enabling gradient-based optimization for robotics control.

tools.name: MonoForce
tools.one_line_profile: Learnable image-conditioned physics engine
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable, learnable physics engine that predicts robot-terrain interactions based on visual input, supporting optimization tasks in robotics.

tools.name: SIPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab toolbox for sampling inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab toolbox for solving inverse problems using sampling methods (Monte Carlo), specifically designed to handle complex prior information.

tools.name: OpenLEGO
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between AGILE and OpenMDAO
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides an interface to connect the AGILE collaborative design framework with the OpenMDAO optimization framework for multidisciplinary design optimization.

tools.name: evoxels
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics framework for voxel microstructures
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics framework specifically designed for the simulation and optimization of voxel-based microstructures, enabling gradient-based design.

tools.name: DeepInverse
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving imaging inverse problems with deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for solving inverse problems in imaging (e.g., denoising, super-resolution, reconstruction) using deep learning techniques.

tools.name: fenics_topopt_foam
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization coupling OpenFOAM and FEniCS
tools.detailed_description: A tool that couples OpenFOAM for fluid simulation with FEniCS/dolfin-adjoint for gradient calculation to perform topology optimization in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: bassovac
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian inversion somatic caller
tools.detailed_description: An improved somatic variant caller utilizing Bayesian inversion techniques for analyzing genomic data.

tools.name: DL4TO
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for topology optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library based on PyTorch for 3D topology optimization, facilitating the integration of neural networks into the topology optimization pipeline.

tools.name: Dojo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics engine for robotics
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine written in Julia, designed for robotics simulation and control, enabling gradient-based optimization of robot trajectories and parameters.

tools.name: dolfin-adjoint
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic differentiation for FEniCS
tools.detailed_description: A tool that automatically derives the discrete adjoint and tangent linear models from a forward model written in the FEniCS finite element framework, enabling efficient optimization and sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: pyadjoint
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithmic differentiation tool for FEniCS/FireDrake
tools.detailed_description: The core algorithmic differentiation engine used by dolfin-adjoint and fire-adjoint to record and replay operations for adjoint calculation in finite element simulations.

tools.name: poisson_caustic_design
tools.one_line_profile: Caustic design via Poisson equation
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool that computes the shape of a transparent surface required to cast a specific target image as a caustic shadow, solving the associated Poisson equation.

tools.name: correctionlib-gradients
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic differentiation for HEP correction factors
tools.detailed_description: An extension to the correctionlib library that provides automatic differentiation capabilities for high-energy physics correction factor calculations.

tools.name: RL2Grid
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark environment for reinforcement learning in power grid operations
tools.detailed_description: RL2Grid is a standardized benchmark for reinforcement learning agents in realistic power grid environments, modeling real-time operations like topology optimization and redispatching with AC power flow simulation.

tools.name: ERT
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble-based Reservoir Tool for sensitivity analysis and data assimilation
tools.detailed_description: ERT (Ensemble based Reservoir Tool) is designed for running ensembles of dynamical models (e.g., reservoir models) to perform sensitivity analysis and data assimilation using Ensemble Smoother methods.

tools.name: Tiny Differentiable Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Header-only C++ and CUDA differentiable physics library
tools.detailed_description: Tiny Differentiable Simulator is a zero-dependency, header-only C++ and CUDA physics library designed for reinforcement learning and robotics, supporting differentiable physics simulation.

tools.name: PaGMO
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel global multiobjective optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: PaGMO is a C++ platform to perform parallel computations of optimisation tasks (global and local) via the asynchronous generalized island model, providing interfaces to algorithms like NLOPT, SNOPT, and IPOPT.

tools.name: PyGMO2
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for the PaGMO optimization library
tools.detailed_description: PyGMO2 is a Python platform to perform parallel computations of optimisation tasks (global and local) via the asynchronous generalized island model, serving as the Python interface to the C++ PaGMO library.

tools.name: BinauralSDM
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for rendering Binaural Room Impulse Responses using Spatial Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools to render Binaural Room Impulse Responses (BRIR) using the Spatial Decomposition Method (SDM), featuring improvements for direction of arrival estimation and reverberation equalization.

tools.name: Angler
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency-domain photonic simulation and inverse design optimization
tools.detailed_description: Angler is a Python package for frequency-domain photonic simulation and inverse design optimization, supporting linear and nonlinear devices.

tools.name: Bayes-Bay
tools.one_line_profile: Generalised Bayesian inversion framework
tools.detailed_description: Bayes-Bay is a generalised Bayesian inversion framework designed to solve inverse problems using trans-dimensional Markov chain Monte Carlo (McMC) methods.

tools.name: OccamyPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for solving large-scale inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: OccamyPy is a Python library for solving large-scale inverse problems, providing operators and solvers for geophysical and general scientific applications.

tools.name: pytorch-minimize
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper to use scipy.optimize.minimize as a PyTorch Optimizer
tools.detailed_description: A library that allows using SciPy's optimization routines (like L-BFGS-B, Newton-CG) directly as PyTorch Optimizers, facilitating physics-informed learning and constrained optimization.

tools.name: torchsde
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable SDE solvers with GPU support
tools.detailed_description: TorchSDE provides differentiable solvers for Stochastic Differential Equations (SDEs) with GPU support and efficient sensitivity analysis, enabling the modeling of continuous-time stochastic dynamics.

tools.name: Ceviche Challenges
tools.one_line_profile: Photonic inverse design challenge problems for topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: A suite of photonic inverse design challenge problems designed for benchmarking topology optimization algorithms and physics-informed machine learning models.

tools.name: hIPPYlib
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible software framework for large-scale inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: hIPPYlib is an extensible software framework for solving large-scale deterministic and Bayesian inverse problems governed by partial differential equations (PDEs), built on FEniCS and PETSc.

tools.name: MoDL
tools.one_line_profile: Model-Based Deep Learning Architecture for Inverse Problems
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning architecture that combines model-based reconstruction with deep learning for solving inverse problems, particularly in imaging.

tools.name: scikit-optimize (fork/variant)
tools.one_line_profile: Sequential model-based optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for sequential model-based optimization, providing a `scipy.optimize` compatible interface for minimizing expensive and noisy black-box functions.

tools.name: GradCEM
tools.one_line_profile: Model-Predictive Control via Cross-Entropy and Gradient-Based Optimization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a model-predictive control algorithm that combines the cross-entropy method with gradient-based optimization for continuous control tasks.

tools.name: BayesMTGDS
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian joint inversion for magnetotelluric and geomagnetic depth sounding
tools.detailed_description: A C++ software for trans-dimensional Bayesian joint inversion of magnetotelluric and geomagnetic depth sounding responses to constrain mantle electrical discontinuities.

tools.name: savvy
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for high-dimensional sensitivity analysis data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to visualize and explore high-dimensionality sensitivity analysis data, aiding in the interpretation of complex model behaviors.

tools.name: ElasticSurfaceEmbedding.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Shape optimization by geometric elasticity for weaving structures
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for shape optimization using geometric elasticity, specifically applied to the design of weaving paper strips and elastic surface embeddings.

tools.name: CDDB
tools.one_line_profile: Direct Diffusion Bridge using Data Consistency for Inverse Problems
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of Direct Diffusion Bridge, a method utilizing data consistency to solve inverse problems with diffusion models.

tools.name: DDS
tools.one_line_profile: Decomposed Diffusion Sampler for Accelerating Large-Scale Inverse Problems
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Decomposed Diffusion Sampling (DDS) for efficiently solving large-scale inverse problems using diffusion models.

tools.name: DiffusionMBIR
tools.one_line_profile: Solving 3D Inverse Problems using Pre-trained 2D Diffusion Models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for solving 3D inverse problems (like CT reconstruction) by leveraging pre-trained 2D diffusion models as priors.

tools.name: MCG_diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold Constrained Gradients for Inverse Problems with Diffusion Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Manifold Constrained Gradients (MCG) to improve diffusion models for solving inverse problems by enforcing manifold constraints.

tools.name: PlasticineLab
tools.one_line_profile: Soft-Body Manipulation Benchmark with Differentiable Physics
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for soft-body manipulation tasks, featuring a differentiable physics engine to support gradient-based optimization and learning.

tools.name: byextopopt
tools.one_line_profile: Structure and Appearance Optimization for Controllable Shape Design
tools.detailed_description: Code for optimizing both structure and appearance in shape design, likely using topology optimization techniques.

tools.name: isopod

tools.detailed_description: An application built on the MOOSE framework designed for solving multiphysics PDE-constrained optimization problems.

tools.name: Quadruped-PyMPC

tools.detailed_description: A Python-based Model Predictive Control (MPC) implementation for quadruped robots, supporting gradient-based (acados) and sampling-based (jax) optimization.

tools.name: topo-fenics

tools.detailed_description: A compact Python implementation for performing large-scale parallel topology optimization using the FEniCS finite element framework.

tools.name: COSCO

tools.detailed_description: A framework for container orchestration in fog computing environments that utilizes co-simulation and gradient-based optimization.

tools.name: CoFI

tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to interface with various inference and inversion tools, providing a common API for solving inverse problems in geophysics and other fields.

tools.name: invrs-gym

tools.detailed_description: A Gym-like environment and collection of challenges for inverse design, facilitating the benchmarking and development of optimization algorithms.

tools.name: Langevin_GJI_2020

tools.detailed_description: MATLAB code for fast sampling in Bayesian seismic inversion using Langevin dynamics Markov chain Monte Carlo methods.

tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Apprenticeship Learning via Inverse Reinforcement Learning (IRL) applied to a 2D toy car control problem.

tools.detailed_description: A tool for the hierarchical Bayesian inversion of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) data to distribution of relaxation times (DRT).

tools.name: BayHunter

tools.detailed_description: A tool for transdimensional Bayesian inversion of surface wave dispersion and receiver functions using Markov Chain Monte Carlo (McMC) methods.

tools.detailed_description: A fast, SciPy-compatible Python implementation of Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) for numerical optimization tasks.

tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for 3D topology optimization using the SIMP (Solid Isotropic Material with Penalization) method.

tools.detailed_description: A deep unfolding network based on the FISTA algorithm for solving inverse problems in imaging, such as compressive sensing and reconstruction.

tools.detailed_description: A library providing constrained multivariate least-squares optimization capabilities, extending scipy's optimization tools.

tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Adaptive Checkpoint Adjoint (ACA) method for accurate and memory-efficient gradient estimation in Neural ODEs.

tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing automatic differentiation capabilities specifically tailored for computational engineering, enabling inverse modeling and physical parameter estimation in PDE-based simulations.

tools.detailed_description: A widely used, compact, and efficient MATLAB code for 3D topology optimization, serving as a standard benchmark and educational tool in structural optimization.

tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based parallel computing tool for temperature sampling Bayesian inversion in Magnetotelluric (MT) geophysical exploration.

tools.detailed_description: A tool integrating Blender and OpenFOAM to perform fluid-based shape optimization, allowing for geometric manipulation and CFD analysis.

tools.detailed_description: MATLAB codes for efficient 3-D topology optimization utilizing multigrid Preconditioned Conjugate Gradient (PCG) methods and approximate sensitivity analysis.

tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for image-based initialization and post-processing in topology optimization workflows, facilitating the handling of geometric data.

tools.detailed_description: A multi-language library (C#/Matlab/Rust) for solving 2D/3D navigation and geodetic problems, including multilateration, TOA/TDOA/AOA positioning, and inverse geodetic calculations.

tools.name: pestpp
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter estimation and uncertainty analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for scalable and non-intrusive parameter estimation, uncertainty analysis, and sensitivity analysis, widely used in environmental and groundwater modeling.

tools.name: Optix
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-based optimization tool for engineering design
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based gradient-based optimization tool designed for engineering design problems, developed by the USU Aero Lab.

tools.name: deepinpy
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for solving deep inverse problems, providing a framework for reconstructing signals and images from measurements using deep learning techniques.

tools.name: VARS-TOOL
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Variogram Analysis of Response Surfaces (VARS), providing tools for global sensitivity analysis of complex models.

tools.name: postprocessing-topopt
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing tool for topology optimization results
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool to post-process 2D topology optimization results into usable smooth geometries, bridging the gap between optimization output and CAD/manufacturing.

tools.name: WhatsOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for multidisciplinary design analysis and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application and platform for defining, analyzing, and executing multidisciplinary design optimization (MDO) workflows.

tools.name: openmdao_extensions
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions for OpenMDAO solvers and drivers
tools.detailed_description: A collection of additional solvers and drivers for the OpenMDAO framework, extending its capabilities for specific optimization methods and workflows.

tools.name: topy
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization using Python
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and flexible topology optimization framework written in Python, suitable for educational purposes and small-scale structural optimization problems.

tools.name: TopADD
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel topology optimization framework for arbitrary domains
tools.detailed_description: A 2D/3D integrated topology optimization parallel-computing framework capable of handling arbitrary design domains using PETSc.

tools.name: k-diffusion-inverse-problems
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion model based solver for inverse problems using optimal posterior covariance
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a method to improve diffusion models for solving inverse problems. It utilizes optimal posterior covariance to enhance the reconstruction quality in tasks such as inpainting and super-resolution, serving as a solver for scientific imaging inverse problems.

tools.name: LibMOON
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for gradient-based multiobjective optimization
tools.detailed_description: LibMOON is a Python library designed to facilitate the study and application of gradient-based multiobjective optimization (MOP). It provides a flexible framework for developing and testing optimization algorithms, particularly relevant for engineering design and multi-physics problems.

tools.name: score_inverse_problems
tools.one_line_profile: Score-based generative models for medical imaging inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation for solving inverse problems in medical imaging using score-based generative models. It provides tools for tasks like Computed Tomography (CT) reconstruction and accelerated MRI, functioning as a solver for ill-posed scientific imaging problems.

tools.name: goNEAT_NS
tools.one_line_profile: Go implementation of NEAT with Novelty Search optimization
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing the Neuro-Evolution of Augmenting Topologies (NEAT) algorithm combined with Novelty Search optimization in Go. It is designed to solve deceptive tasks with strong local optima, applicable in evolutionary robotics and complex system optimization.

tools.name: dl4to4ocp
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization tool for OCP-based CAD models
tools.detailed_description: A tool that integrates the dl4to library with OCP-based CAD models (CadQuery/Build123d) to perform topology optimization. It allows users to apply deep learning-based topology optimization directly to parametric CAD geometries.

tools.name: spgrid_topo_opt
tools.one_line_profile: Narrow-band topology optimization on sparsely populated grids
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ implementation of topology optimization using the SPGrid (Sparsely Populated Grid) data structure. It is designed for efficient structural optimization on high-resolution grids, as presented in SIGGRAPH Asia 2018.

tools.name: TopOpt
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based topology optimization design tool
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB scripts and functions for performing topology optimization design. It serves as a lightweight library for educational and research purposes in structural design optimization.

tools.name: nelder_mead_scipy
tools.one_line_profile: Standalone Nelder-Mead optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A standalone extraction of the Nelder-Mead optimization algorithm from SciPy. It is designed for use in environments where installing the full SciPy stack is difficult, such as embedded within ABAQUS scripts for engineering optimization.

tools.name: inn-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse problem solver using conditional invertible neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for solving scientific inverse problems using conditional Invertible Neural Networks (cINNs) as surrogates. It enables probabilistic inference and uncertainty quantification in physical parameter estimation tasks.

tools.name: topopt
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for topology optimization, providing tools to set up and solve structural optimization problems. It includes implementations of standard methods like SIMP (Solid Isotropic Material with Penalization).

tools.name: DAPS
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion inverse problem solver with decoupled noise annealing
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the DAPS method (CVPR 2025) for solving inverse problems using diffusion models. It features a decoupled noise annealing strategy to improve the robustness and quality of image reconstruction in scientific and general imaging contexts.

tools.name: taichi-TopOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization framework in Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A topology optimization framework implemented in the Taichi programming language. It leverages Taichi's parallel computing capabilities to accelerate the topology optimization process for structural design.

tools.name: TopologyGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization using Generative Adversarial Networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that uses Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to perform topology optimization. It predicts optimal structures based on physical fields over the initial domain, accelerating the design process compared to traditional iterative methods.

tools.name: FvOR
tools.one_line_profile: Joint shape and pose optimization for object reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A robust framework for joint shape and pose optimization aimed at few-view object reconstruction. It solves the inverse problem of recovering 3D structure and orientation from limited 2D observations.

tools.name: Spikingformer-CML
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization framework for Transformer-based Spiking Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for optimizing Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs) using a transformer-based architecture and SNN-optimized downsampling with precise gradient backpropagation. It is relevant for neuromorphic computing and energy-efficient scientific modeling.

tools.name: ShAPO
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit representations for multi-object shape and pose optimization
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based tool for joint multi-object shape, appearance, and pose optimization using implicit representations. It addresses the inverse problem of inferring 3D scene properties from observations, applicable in robotics and computer vision.
